    Teaching Lexically book launch

    On 28 July I went to the book launch for Teaching Lexically, written by Hugh Dellar and Andrew Walkley. The event took place at the pairâ€™s new language school, London Language Lab. Naturally I took my camera along to the event and took a few snaps. Some of my shots were used by Delta Publishing on their Facebook Page.
